title: Machine Learning Framework for Carbon Emission Prediction in Bridge Design Phases

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering knowledge and data analysis skills at Excel proficiency level
context.additional_context: Course focusing on cultivating practitioners' ability to utilize machine learning models for carbon emission optimization during the design phase

learning_goals: Learners can preprocess bridge design data and convert it into a structure suitable for input into machine learning models (e.g., GBRT)
Learners can interpret the impact of bridge design parameters on carbon emissions using SHAP and PDP-ICE techniques
Learners can quantitatively evaluate the performance of predictive models by applying a Composite Weighted Index (CWI)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
